captions.text:
ANNOUNCER: Everyday life can
sometimes seem ordinary.

So it's natural to crave
something more.

To hunger for something that
you can't describe.

As it turns out, all you have
to do is step inside.

title: Cirque du Soleil Worlds Away 3D - Official Movie Trailer 2012 (HD)

comments.text:
If it wasn't for imdb I would think this is a circus performance. Half the

sure... definitely not a documentary though.

comments.text:
The story is interpretative, you really need an eye for aesthetics and the 
ability to read movement in both body and music - subtle (or not so subtle).

A movie for the senses, not the eyes. 

It's quite similar to a ballet performance, some people enjoy it and others 
not so much.﻿

comments.author: lalobarrera99

comments.text:
I am, just got baptized in 2011 and also a fan of Cirque du soleil since 
4th grade. This is not mimicking anything. There is no such thing as 
mimicking in world of Cirque du soleil. They have always created their own 
unique atmosphere and world no other have created. There are no hidden 
messages or anything. Just pure art, imagination, fantasy, and amazing 
performance.
comments.author: vamosnippon

comments.text:
*Cirque Du Soleil 3D*
De la carpa del circo a la gran pantalla, el visionario director de cine 
James Cameron junto al director Andrew Adamson (Shrek, Narnia), te invitan 
a una nueva aventura en 3D: Cirque du Soleil, Mundos lejanos.  Una joven 
pareja separada debe viajar a través de los increíbles mundos de ensueño 
del Cirque du Soleil para reencontrarse el publico tendrá la oportunidad de 
sumergirse en la tecnología 3D que le permitirá saltar, planear, nadar y 
bailar junto a los artistas.

#cirquedusoleilworldsaway  se estrena el 5 de Abril en #cinesunidos  en 
#venezuela  ﻿
